problem.markdown:
You are importing data from four CSV files that are located in the same folder. All four of the CSV files have the same file structure. You are using the “From folder” option of the query.
>>What is the initial step you need to do in the Query Editor before loading the data into the Excel data model?<<
( ) Create relationships between the four CSV files. (x) Filter the header from the three other CSV files. ( ) Remove duplicate rows from the four CSV files. ( ) Create a unique id for each row of the four CSV files.
[explanation] If all four CSV files have headers, the first step you typically do is to remove the headers from the other three CSV files. [explanation]
